Description: Wheelmade ceramic table amphora with a ledge rim and double-collared neck, two handles, a bag-shaped body and a high ring foot (damaged). Covered in red slip over interior and exterior, with the ledge rim painted black, and 4 black bands painted around the lower body.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Faras (Nubia), Meroitic Cemetery Tomb-Group 1/2606 A
